Kuroma unleashes a dark and ominous aura capable of serving multiple purposes. The aura is able to subdue and restrain the opponent. The aura is also able to serve as an attack and defence, deflecting another attack or forcing the opponent into the defensive by blowing them away.

[[es:Jutsu de Sellado: Aura Negra]]
[[pt-br:Técnica de Selamento: Aura Negra]]
[[pl:Technika Pieczętująca: Czarna Aura]]
